title: Organize Your Inspirations
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this category? The related prompts will not be deleted.

batchDeleteModal.title: Batch Delete Prompts
batchDeleteModal.noTags: No filterable tags in this category.
batchDeleteModal.selectTagsLabel: Select tags (will delete prompts containing any of the selected tags):

previewMessage.selectTags: Please select at least one tag to preview matching results.
previewMessage.noMatch: No prompts found matching the selected tags.

batchDeleteModal.confirmMessageAll: Are you sure you want to delete all {count} prompts under the category "{categoryName}"? The category itself will be preserved. This action is irreversible.
batchDeleteModal.confirmMessageByTag: Are you sure you want to delete {count} prompts under the category "{categoryName}" that include the tags [{tags}]? This action is irreversible.

mergeImportModal.title: Import and Merge Prompts
mergeImportModal.description: Bulk add prompts from a file to your collection.
mergeImportModal.step2Description: Assign at least one category to all imported prompts.
mergeImportModal.step3Description: Add common tags to all prompts from this import for easy tracking.
mergeImportModal.tagInputPlaceholder: Add a tag and press Enter...
mergeImportModal.disabledMergeTooltip: Please select a file and associate at least one category first

toast.invalidFormat: Invalid file format, "prompts" array not found.
toast.noPromptsInFile: No importable prompts found in the file.
toast.mergeSuccess: Merge complete! Added {importedCount} new items, skipped {skippedCount} duplicates.
toast.unknownError: An unknown error occurred during the merge
